name: Soldier's Silhouette V1.1
description:
A short vertical slice of the game Big Kenneth. a phycological horror which is base on a distressed WW2 solider in a coma hospital.

This is a FMP game for second year of college.

People involved in the making of Big Kenneth: Marshall Sharp (programmer), Alex Allen (level designer, team leader), Benjamin Cirulis (3D artist, sounds designer, narrative writer), Patrick Shawcross (3D artist, UI Artist), and Sonnie Silva (3D artist)

This is the final V1.1 Build. This is the vertical slice of the game!

I would just like to congratulate my team on this and endorse everyone for putting in the effort to create this amazing game.
